data.text: We are incredibly proud to have been awarded Diamond status in Health and Safety by @theAPEXassoc and @SimpliFlying. This is the highest standard, and shows our commitment to keeping our customers and teams safe throughout the Covid-19 pandemic. Read more: https://t.co/EPTnaFp9jy https://t.co/9VkBRg3Llt

data.text: Since the start of the pandemic, hundreds of our people signed up to support the @NHS. Now, they're set to assist them with the rollout of the Covid-19 vaccine, supporting the national effort to save lives. We couldn't be more proud of them. ❤️💙 https://t.co/qCKfuNhTPc

data.text: The health and safety of our customers and people is always our number one priority. We now require all travellers flying from @HeathrowAirport to the United States to have a negative Covid-19 test result before departure. For more information please visit https://t.co/yqN3N7yvOu https://t.co/fsRU780HRI
